/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by lush green trees and bushes, creating a natural canopy overhead. A white car is parked on the right side of the street, adding a touch of modern life to the scene. On the left side of the street, a yellow traffic light stands sentinel, guiding the flow of unseen traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light.
